title: Exciting Enemy Observation
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Guilty Kiss’ live will finally begin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>A mix of unease and excitement, what a weird feeling I’m having<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You look like you’re really enjoying it though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Umi-chan. Have you forgotten that we came here to observe our enemy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh….I haven’t….forgotten, though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Liar. You totally forgot didn’t you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Uu….But, Karin! You shouldn’t be the one to talk! You have penlights on both hands! If we are observing, then wouldn’t they be opera glasses instead!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh!? Th, that’s…. You see, I’m studying the big picture first. Then after that, we can take a closer look with opera glasses….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….You have a point. That’s right. Looking at the bigger picture is important<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>If you pay attention, then you shouldn’t need opera glasses right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re right. Then, Karin…. Do lend me a penlight….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
